Ref: CXP079/2024

Criteria:

  • Matric with relevant Qualification
  • Trade Tested Electrician (Red Seal) with Wireman’s License
  • Knowledgeable on Asset management and Health & Safety Regulations
  • Min 5 years’ experience in Manufacturing & Production Environment
  • Ability to show optimization of machine and plant availability
  • Able to do mechanical breakdowns (advantageous) (Hydraulic and Pneumatic)
  • MUST BE PREPARED TO WORK SHIFTS
  • Experience on overhead cranes up to 30 ton
  • AC/DC Drives, Servo motor & Encoder knowledge
  • Advanced PLC experience on fault finding, programming and troubleshooting
  • Advanced Inverter experience on fault finding, programming and troubleshooting
  • Computer literate – MS Office

Apply via website or alternatively via: https://forms.gle/8mRbBqpY1WY7fSPs7
